name: Sour Bait
desc:
A type of bait based on flour mixed with the pulp and seeds of Bulle Fruit. When tossed into the water, it quickly spreads a sweet and sour fragrance that is irresistible to fishes such as Heartfeather Bass. A group of anglers once resorted to eating this bait in an emergency after they had run out of supplies, and were poisoned as a result. To prevent such accidents from happening again, this type of bait was made much sourer than it was before – so sour in fact that simply holding it up to their noses makes people feel dizzy and causes their eyes to stream, let alone putting it in their mouths...

Suitable for catching Heartfeather Bass.

customize.name: Bulle Fruit
customize.desc: A fruit that grows in warm and damp environments with ample sunlight. Inside this round and rotund fruit hides a sweet and refreshing surprise.

customize.name: Wheat
customize.desc: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

customize.name: Formula: Sour Bait
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Sour Bait.

customize.name: Delaroche
customize.desc: The director of the Fontaine Fishing Association. She was unanimously elected due to her experience as a former clerk at the Fontaine Research Institute and valuable contributions to the association by providing unused equipment from the Institute.

value.name: Formula: Sour Bait
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Sour Bait.
